1. The 21st Century Library

CC-BY-SA by ConnectedLib

In this section, we’ll talk about how connected learning will help you implement many of the principles outlined in The Future of Library Services for and with Teens: A Call to Action and YALSA’s Teen Programming Guidelines.

After completing this section, you will be able to...
  • Describe a 21st century library
  • Explain how connected learning can help you implement the principles outlined by The Future of Library Services For and With Teens and the YALSA Teen Programming Guidelines
